BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_DE

When using the jdk version 1.4.2 to run Eclipse it works. 

Eclipse: 
Version: 3.0.0
Build id: 200402260800

I don't understand this bug report. Are you running Eclipse on 1.5? Please 
provide more details/steps to reproduce the problem.

I'm running eclipse with the JDK 1.5.0-beta (just to see if it works).
I've encounterd a problem within one of my junit test cases an 
I've tried to debug it. The debugger starts and terminates. 
If I look into the error log of eclipse I find the exception posted within 
my first post. 

If I do exactly the same using a JDK 1.4.2 to start eclipse it is possible to
debug my junit test. I'm using the Project JDK to run the test case.

When running eclipse with the JDK 1.5.0 the JDK used to compile and run the
Project is the 1.4.2.

Eclipse is not supported on JDK1.5 yet :-) It is claimed to support a 1.4 
runtime.
